thread.title: Maisie Smith 'struggling' as boyfriend Max George prepares for heart surgery
thread.title_full: Maisie Smith 'struggling' as boyfriend Max George prepares for heart surgery

author: ( Image: Jeff Spicer/Getty Images for EE)
title: Maisie Smith 'struggling' as boyfriend Max George prepares for heart surgery
text:
Maisie Smith is balancing her acting career with her desire to be by Max George's bedside, with The Wanted star revealing he may have to undergo heart surgery earlier than expected The Wanted star Max George, 36, is currently in hospital after being rushed to A&E by his mum last week with suspected heart issues.
The musician has frequently shared that the support of his loved ones - including girlfriend Maisie Smith, 23 - is helping him get through the tough time, but Maisie herself is reportedly struggling. EastEnders alum Maisie is currently starring in a panto in Canterbury, meaning she's hard at work and can't spend as much with Max as she'd like.
An insider said that it was a "worrying and distressing time" for the couple, and added: "All she wants to do is be by his bedside day and night but she's committed to her panto show and doesn't want to let anyone down." They told The Sun that Maisie was struggling with "juggling everything," but was doing her best to spend time with Max during visiting hours and around her schedule. "Max is on her mind 24/7 and she wants more than anything for him to be better as soon as possible," the source shared.
Despite her work and life conflicts,â€¦
